effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 981,641 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 562,715.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.
